name: Rule the Universe
description:
Use the ARROW KEYS to fly or switch between dialogue options. 

Use SPACE BAR to shoot or choose a selected dialogue option.

Press ESC (once in default size, twice in fullscreen mode) to pause the game.

Your mission is to become the dominant force in the star system by interacting with all the alien species in the area. 

For the Pixelles Game Incubator 8.
